name: La Carbonara
description:
La Carbonara is a short adventure game with multiple endings about how the iconic Italian dish is made.

The game is available in English and Spanish, with some dashes of Italian here and there. Mamma mia!

In La Carbonara you will find:

  • Eggs
  • Cheese
  • Panceta. Or was it bacon?
  • Some sweet, sweet spaghettis

This is a study game where I tried to handmade everything I could, that is: """"art""", """music"""  and code. Have fun and thanks for playing!

La Carbonara is made with the amazing engine Adventure Game Studio. Thanks a lot to the devs that have worked and keep working on it! Also, thanks to the module developers. This game uses the following modules:

  • Tween
  • Queued Speech
  • EpicShadows
